students.title: Student Administration
students.description: Manage your students here. You can add, edit, and delete students.

deleteAllData.title: Delete All Student Data
deleteAllData.description: This action will permanently delete all student data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteAllData.confirmDescription: Do you really want to delete all student data? This action cannot be undone.
deleteAllData.success: All data has been successfully deleted

settings.title: Settings
settings.ldapConfigDescription: Configure your LDAP server settings for student synchronization.
